snippet: A fan ritual for big games, including this year’s Orange Bowl: Spending $2 bills stamped with a tiger paw.
abstract: Football fans of the Clemson University Tigers are stamping $2 bills with a tiger paw; many of the 10,000 fans headed to the Orange Bowl will spend bills they believe make a statement about Tiger pride.

byline.original: By KIM SEVERSON and ROBBIE BROWN

lead_paragraph: A fan ritual for big games, including this year’s Orange Bowl: Spending $2 bills stamped with a tiger paw.

headline.main: Clemson Fans Hold Fast to a Tradition Worth More Than the Paper It’s Printed On
headline.print_headline: Clemson Fans Hold Fast to a Tradition Worth More Than the Paper It’s Printed On
